product_name: Sea to Summit Eclipse Paddling Gloves
long_description: The Sea to Summit Eclipse paddling gloves offer light coverage and help you maintain the nuanced feel of your paddle. Sea to Summit Eclipse paddling gloves protect the back of your hands from the sun with a UPF rating of 50+; supple fabric stretches and moves with your hand motions. 2mm neoprene cuffs seal comfortably around wrists. Tough synthetic leather palms offer high durability. Contoured, double-layered fabric enhances durability in wear-prone areas.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Eclipse paddling gloves offer light coverage and help you maintain the nuanced feel of your paddle.
